forceRename.description: Override the default resource name. Mutually exclusive with prefix and suffix.

prefix.description: Prefix to prepend to the resource name. Mutually exclusive with forceRename.

suffix.description: Suffix to append to the resource name. Defaults to the resource identifier if there are multiple items, otherwise empty. Mutually exclusive with forceRename.

annotations.description: Annotations to set on the item.

labels.description: Labels to set on the item.
